channel.title: print on Portfolio | Ashley Kolodziej - Boston Freelance Web Designer
channel.description: Recent content in print on Portfolio | Ashley Kolodziej - Boston Freelance Web Designer

item.title: Fireside Follies
item.description: Fireside Follies is a monthly reading series based out of Bushwick, New York, featuring the best up and coming literature to be found anywhere. I illustrated and designed the posters for this project in its beginning stages, incorporating new elements into the illustrations, such as music, as the event grew. It’s a beautiful thing. For more information on Fireside Follies, take a look at the official website.

item.title: in: The Conde Nast Intern Magazine
item.description: Participants in the Condé Nast Summer Internship Program have the opportunity of taking part in an intern-produced, created, and published magazine which is distributed internally at the end of the summer. Put together entirely outside of our internships, this magazine required a great deal of teamwork and coordination to pull together in the short ten weeks we had, several of which were dedicated to planning. As Art Director, I worked with the Creative Director in implementing a consistent visual theme throughout the magazine, designing several spreads and tweaking others to give the magazine a cohesive look and feel.

item.title: Roberto Cavalli Milestone Promotion
item.description: I created this two-sided promotional sheet during my time as an intern at Women’s Wear Daily for a special milestone section celebrating Roberto Cavalli’s 40th anniversary.
